title: Norwegian Wood
author: Haruki Murakami
quote: "If you only read the books that everyone else is reading, you can only think what everyone else is thinking."

title: A Song of Ice and Fire
author: George R. R. Martin
quote: "When you play the game of thrones, you win or you die."

title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
author: J.K. Rowling
quote: "Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light."

title: It Ends With Us
author: Colleen Hoover
quote: "Just because someone hurts you doesn’t mean you can simply stop loving them."

title: It Starts With Us
author: Colleen Hoover
quote: "Sometimes the one who loves you is the one who hurts you the most."

title: Ugly Love
author: Colleen Hoover
quote: "Love isn’t always pretty. Sometimes you spend all your time hoping it’ll eventually be something different."

title: Your Fault
author: Andrew Cowan
quote: "The stories we tell ourselves shape the lives we lead."

title: Mile High
author: Liz Tomforde
quote: "Sometimes love takes you to unexpected altitudes."

title: Ikigai
author: Héctor García and Francesc Miralles
quote: "The purpose of life is to find your purpose and give your whole heart and soul to it."

title: Eat That Frog!
author: Brian Tracy
quote: "If you have to eat two frogs, eat the ugliest one first."

title: The Subtle Art of Not Giving a F*ck
author: Mark Manson
quote: "You can’t be an important and life-changing presence for some people without also being a joke and an embarrassment to others."

title: Kafka on the Shore
author: Haruki Murakami
quote: "Memories warm you up from the inside. But they also tear you apart."

title: The Fault in Our Stars
author: John Green
quote: "You don’t get to choose if you get hurt in this world, but you do have some say in who hurts you."

title: 3000 Stitches
author: Sudha Murty
quote: "Every small act of kindness adds up to something bigger than you can imagine."

title: Kimayagar
author: B. R. Bhagwat
quote: "Magic lies in curiosity and courage to explore the unknown."

title: Archer's Voice
author: Mia Sheridan
quote: "Sometimes the silence between two people is more powerful than a thousand words."
